data.summary_en: Gyukatsu Motomura offers an exceptional dining experience, allowing patrons to savor perfectly fried beef cutlets that you cook to your liking on a personal hot stone grill. The atmosphere is bustling yet efficient, a testament to its popularity. Each bite reveals tender, flavorful beef with a crisp coating, complemented by various sauces and sides. Service is prompt and friendly, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable meal. It's a must-visit for a unique and interactive culinary adventure.
data.summary_ko: 규카츠 모토무라는 직접 뜨거운 돌판에 규카츠를 구워 먹는 독특한 경험을 제공합니다. 바삭하면서도 부드러운 육질의 규카츠는 다양한 소스와 잘 어울려 풍부한 맛을 선사합니다. 항상 활기찬 분위기 속에서도 친절하고 효율적인 서비스가 돋보이며, 후쿠오카에서 꼭 맛봐야 할 특별한 음식점입니다.
data.location: Japan, 〒810-0001 Fukuoka, Chuo Ward, Tenjin, 2-chōme−11−１ 福岡パルコ新館 B2F B202区画
data.menuInfo: Gyukatsu & Grated Yam Set (¥1,800), Gyukatsu & Mentaiko Set (¥2,000), Double Gyukatsu Set (¥2,600)
data.travelTips: Arrive before peak lunch/dinner times to avoid long queues. Cook the gyukatsu briefly on the hot stone grill at your table to your preferred doneness.
data.essentialItems: Cash or Credit Card, an appetite for delicious fried beef.

data.summary_en: Hakata Mizutaki Toriden offers an authentic and refined experience of Fukuoka's signature chicken hotpot. The rich, milky broth, simmered to perfection, is truly the star, offering incredible depth of flavor. The tender chicken and fresh vegetables perfectly complement the broth. The elegant yet relaxed atmosphere makes it suitable for both casual dining and special occasions. Service is attentive, guiding diners through the traditional mizutaki experience. A quintessential Hakata culinary journey.
data.summary_ko: 하카타 미즈타키 토리덴은 후쿠오카의 대표적인 닭고기 전골 요리인 미즈타키를 맛볼 수 있는 곳입니다. 진하고 깊은 맛의 육수는 일품이며, 부드러운 닭고기와 신선한 채소가 완벽한 조화를 이룹니다. 고급스러우면서도 편안한 분위기는 식사를 더욱 즐겁게 하며, 친절한 서비스는 전통적인 미즈타키를 경험하는 데 도움을 줍니다. 후쿠오카 미식 경험의 정수입니다.
data.menuInfo: Hakata Mizutaki Course (from ¥4,500), Additional Chicken (¥1,500), Zosui (rice porridge, ¥600)
data.travelTips: Reservations are highly recommended, especially for dinner. Take your time to enjoy the rich chicken broth before adding other ingredients.
data.essentialItems: Reservation if possible, an empty stomach for a hearty meal.

data.summary_en: Hyotan Sushi is a local favorite renowned for its incredibly fresh seafood and skillfully prepared sushi. The vibrant atmosphere and bustling energy add to the dining experience. Each piece of sushi is a testament to quality, with perfectly seasoned rice and melt-in-your-mouth toppings. While often busy, the wait is well worth it for the delicious and authentic flavors. The attentive chefs and efficient service ensure a memorable meal, making it a top choice for sushi lovers in Fukuoka.
data.summary_ko: 효탄 스시는 신선한 해산물과 숙련된 솜씨로 만든 스시로 유명한 현지 맛집입니다. 활기찬 분위기는 식사를 더욱 즐겁게 합니다. 한 점 한 점 완벽하게 간이 된 밥과 입에서 살살 녹는 재료는 스시의 품질을 증명합니다. 줄이 길 수 있지만, 맛있고 정통적인 맛을 위해 기다릴 가치가 충분합니다. 친절한 셰프와 효율적인 서비스는 잊을 수 없는 식사를 선사합니다.
data.location: Japan, 〒810-0001 Fukuoka, Chuo Ward, Tenjin, 2-chōme−10−２０ 新天閣ビル 2F
data.menuInfo: Tenjin Set (¥2,000), Hyotan Set (¥3,000), Omakase Sushi (seasonal pricing), Tuna Nigiri (¥400-¥800)
data.travelTips: Often has long queues, especially during lunch; arrive early. The upstairs branch (Honten) is known for higher quality sushi.
data.essentialItems: Patience for queues, a love for fresh seafood.

data.summary_en: Hakata Issou Honten delivers an iconic Fukuoka ramen experience. Their signature tonkotsu broth is incredibly rich and creamy, yet surprisingly smooth, with a distinct "foamy" characteristic that sets it apart. The thin, firm noodles perfectly complement the broth, and the tender chashu pork adds another layer of flavor. Despite the often long queues, the efficient service ensures a relatively quick turnaround. It's a must-try for anyone seeking an authentic and deeply satisfying bowl of Hakata ramen.
data.summary_ko: 하카타 잇소우 본점은 후쿠오카 라멘의 상징적인 경험을 선사합니다. 그들의 대표적인 돈코츠 육수는 놀랍도록 진하고 크리미하며, 독특한 "거품" 특징이 차별점을 줍니다. 얇고 단단한 면발은 육수와 완벽한 조화를 이루고, 부드러운 차슈 돼지고기는 풍미를 더합니다. 긴 줄에도 불구하고 효율적인 서비스 덕분에 비교적 빠르게 식사를 할 수 있습니다. 진정으로 만족스러운 하카타 라멘 한 그릇을 찾는 사람들에게 꼭 추천하는 곳입니다.
data.menuInfo: Tonkotsu Ramen (¥800), Special Tonkotsu Ramen (¥1,000), Char Siu Ramen (¥1,100), Gyoza (¥400), Kaedama (noodle refill, ¥150)
data.travelTips: Known for its rich, creamy tonkotsu broth and thin noodles. You can specify the hardness of your noodles. Expect queues, especially at peak times. Cash-only payment.
data.essentialItems: Cash, patience for queues, a strong appetite for rich ramen.

data.summary_en: Daitoen Honten offers a premium yakiniku experience, serving exquisite cuts of Japanese wagyu beef in a stylish and comfortable setting. The quality of the meat is exceptional, melting in your mouth with every bite, perfectly grilled at your table. Beyond the fantastic food, the ambiance is sophisticated, making it ideal for special occasions or a luxurious meal. The service is impeccable, with staff providing attentive yet unobtrusive assistance. A truly indulgent culinary highlight in Fukuoka.
data.summary_ko: 다이토엔 본점은 세련되고 편안한 분위기에서 최상급 와규 야키니쿠를 즐길 수 있는 프리미엄 경험을 제공합니다. 고기 품질은 탁월하며, 테이블에서 직접 구워 먹는 모든 한 점이 입안에서 녹아내립니다. 환상적인 음식 외에도 세련된 분위기는 특별한 날이나 고급스러운 식사에 이상적입니다. 흠잡을 데 없는 서비스는 세심하면서도 방해받지 않는 도움을 제공합니다. 후쿠오카에서 진정으로 사치스러운 미식의 정점입니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday-Friday: 11:30 AM - 2:00 PM, 4:00 PM - 10:30 PM; Saturday-Sunday: 11:30 AM - 10:30 PM
data.menuInfo: Prime Karubi (¥2,500), Premium Roasts (¥3,000-¥5,000), Assorted Wagyu Platter (¥8,000-¥12,000), Yukke (beef tartare, ¥1,800), Cold Noodles (¥1,000)
data.travelTips: Reservations are highly recommended due to its popularity. A great place to experience high-quality Japanese wagyu beef cooked at your table. Offers private rooms.
data.essentialItems: Reservation, a desire for premium Japanese beef, comfortable attire.

data.summary_en: This place offers an exceptional gyukatsu experience. The thinly sliced beef is lightly breaded and fried, then you cook it to your preferred doneness on a hot stone grill right at your table. The quality of the meat is outstanding, tender and juicy, perfectly complemented by various sauces. Despite its popularity, the service is efficient and friendly, ensuring a delightful and unique dining adventure in Fukuoka.
data.summary_ko: 규카츠 모토무라 후쿠오카 파르코점은 독특하고 맛있는 식사를 제공합니다. 얇게 튀겨진 소고기 커틀릿을 개인 화로에 원하는 굽기로 직접 구워 먹는 재미가 있습니다. 고기는 매우 부드럽고 육즙이 풍부하며, 다양한 소스와 함께 즐길 수 있어 더욱 만족스럽습니다. 인기가 많아 대기 시간이 길 수 있지만, 친절한 서비스와 특별한 맛이 기다림을 충분히 보상해 줄 것입니다. 후쿠오카에서 꼭 경험해야 할 미식 중 하나입니다.
data.location: B2F B202, Fukuoka Parco Shinkan, 2-chōme−11−１ Tenjin, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka, 810-0001 Japan
data.menuInfo: Gyukatsu Set (牛カツセット) (¥1300-¥2000), Additional Gyukatsu (追加牛カツ) (¥900), Grated Yam (とろろ) (¥100)
data.travelTips: Arrive early or during off-peak hours to avoid long queues, as it's very popular. You cook the gyukatsu briefly on a personal hot stone grill to your liking.
data.essentialItems: Cash or card for payment, an appetite for delicious fried beef cutlets.

data.summary_en: Chikae is a renowned seafood restaurant, famed for its large central 'ikesu' where fresh catches swim. While the lunch set is a legendary deal, dinner offers a more elaborate, expensive kaiseki experience. The sashimi is incredibly fresh, showcasing the ocean's bounty, and other dishes like tempura are expertly prepared. The atmosphere is traditional yet grand, providing a refined setting for an unforgettable seafood feast. Service is impeccable, making every guest feel truly special.
data.summary_ko: 치카에는 중앙에 대형 활어 수조인 '이케스'가 있어 신선한 해산물을 바로 맛볼 수 있는 유명한 해산물 전문점입니다. 점심 특선은 가성비가 좋기로 유명하며, 저녁에는 좀 더 고급스러운 가이세키 코스를 즐길 수 있습니다. 사시미는 더할 나위 없이 신선하고, 튀김 등 다른 요리들도 훌륭합니다. 전통적이면서도 웅장한 분위기에서 잊지 못할 해산물 만찬을 즐길 수 있으며, 서비스 또한 최상입니다.
data.operatingHours: Weekdays: 5:00 PM - 10:00 PM; Saturday: 11:30 AM - 3:00 PM, 5:00 PM - 10:00 PM; Sunday: 11:30 AM - 3:00 PM, 5:00 PM - 9:00 PM
data.menuInfo: Kaiseki Course (懐石コース) (¥8000-¥15000+), Ikesu Sashimi (活け簀刺身) (¥3000-¥5000+), Tempura Assortment (天ぷら盛り合わせ) (¥2000-¥3000)
data.travelTips: Famous for its bustling lunch queue for a more affordable set menu. For dinner, make a reservation to enjoy the full Kaiseki experience. The restaurant has a large 'ikesu' (fish tank) in the middle, providing a unique ambiance.
data.essentialItems: Reservation for dinner, an appreciation for fresh seafood, a camera for the impressive interior.

data.summary_en: Tempura Hirao Honten is a legendary spot for incredibly fresh and affordable tempura. Each piece is fried to order and served directly to your plate, ensuring maximum crispness and flavor. The highlight is their generous serving of complimentary seasoned cabbage, which is addictive. Despite the usual long lines, the efficient service and outstanding value make it a must-visit for a true Fukuoka tempura experience. It's simple, unpretentious, and utterly delicious.
data.summary_ko: 텐푸라 히라오 본점은 놀랍도록 신선하고 저렴한 튀김을 맛볼 수 있는 전설적인 맛집입니다. 주문 즉시 하나씩 튀겨져 따뜻하고 바삭한 튀김을 바로 즐길 수 있습니다. 특히, 무한 리필되는 맛있는 양념 양배추는 튀김과 환상의 조합을 이룹니다. 긴 대기 줄이 흔하지만, 효율적인 시스템과 뛰어난 가성비, 그리고 변함없는 맛은 후쿠오카 튀김을 경험하기에 최고의 선택입니다.
data.menuInfo: Hirao Set (ひらお定食) (¥1000-¥1500), Vegetable Tempura Set (野菜天ぷら定食) (¥800-¥1200), Prawn Tempura (えび天) (¥200-¥300 per piece)
data.travelTips: Expect a queue, especially during peak times. The unique system involves ordering at a vending machine and then being seated. Enjoy the complimentary seasoned cabbage while you wait for your freshly fried tempura.
data.essentialItems: Cash (often cash-only), an appetite for hot, fresh tempura, and patience for the wait.

data.summary_en: Yoshizuka Unagiya is a legendary establishment offering exquisitely prepared unagi. The grilled eel is perfectly tender with a delightful char, coated in a sweet and savory tare sauce that has been perfected over generations. The traditional setting, complete with tatami seating, enhances the authentic dining experience. While on the pricier side, the unparalleled quality and historical significance make it a worthwhile indulgence for anyone seeking the finest unagi in Fukuoka.
data.summary_ko: 요시즈카 우나기야는 훌륭하게 조리된 장어를 제공하는 전설적인 식당입니다. 구운 장어는 완벽하게 부드럽고 맛있는 그릴 향이 나며, 수대에 걸쳐 완성된 달콤하고 짭짤한 타레 소스가 발라져 있습니다. 다다미 좌석을 갖춘 전통적인 분위기는 진정한 식사 경험을 더욱 풍부하게 합니다. 가격대가 높은 편이지만, 비할 데 없는 품질과 역사적 의미는 후쿠오카에서 최고의 장어를 찾는 사람들에게 가치 있는 선택입니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday, Thursday-Sunday: 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM (Closed Tuesday, Wednesday)
data.menuInfo: Unaju (Eel Rice Box) (¥3500-¥6000 depending on size), Kabayaki (Grilled Eel) (¥3000-¥5500), Shirayaki (Plain Grilled Eel) (¥2800-¥5200), Kimoyaki (Grilled Eel Liver) (¥800).
data.travelTips: This historic restaurant is very popular, so expect a wait. It's known for its traditional preparation of unagi, which is a local specialty.
data.essentialItems: Patience for waiting, appreciate traditional Japanese dining.

data.summary_en: Tempura Hirao Main Store delivers an exceptional value and incredibly fresh tempura experience. Each piece is fried to order right in front of you, ensuring maximum crispness and flavor. The generous portions of various seafood and vegetable tempura, along with unlimited delicious pickles, make for a truly satisfying meal. The casual, bustling atmosphere adds to its charm, providing an authentic local dining adventure that shouldn't be missed.
data.summary_ko: 텐푸라 히라오 본점은 탁월한 가치와 놀랍도록 신선한 튀김 경험을 제공합니다. 모든 튀김은 바로 앞에서 주문 즉시 튀겨져 최고의 바삭함과 풍미를 보장합니다. 다양한 해산물과 채소 튀김의 넉넉한 양과 무제한으로 제공되는 맛있는 젓갈은 정말 만족스러운 식사를 만들어줍니다. 캐주얼하고 활기찬 분위기는 이곳의 매력을 더하며, 놓치지 말아야 할 진정한 현지 식사 경험을 선사합니다.
data.menuInfo: Hirao Set (Shrimp, Fish, Vegetables) (¥1200), Abalone Tempura (¥800), Various Vegetable Tempura (¥100-¥300 per piece), Rice (¥200).
data.travelTips: Famous for its fresh, made-to-order tempura and unlimited free pickles (shiokara). It's a casual, counter-style restaurant. Be prepared to stand in line.
data.essentialItems: Empty stomach, appreciation for fresh tempura.

data.summary_en: Gyukatsu Motomura offers a unique and interactive dining experience where you grill thinly sliced beef cutlets to perfection on your personal hot stone. The beef is incredibly tender and flavorful, complemented by various dipping sauces and condiments. The efficient service and lively atmosphere make it a popular choice, though be prepared for a wait. It's a modern take on Japanese cuisine that's definitely worth trying.
data.summary_ko: 규카츠 모토무라에서는 직접 불판에 소고기 커틀릿을 구워 먹는 특별한 경험을 할 수 있습니다. 겉은 바삭하고 속은 부드러운 규카츠는 다양한 소스와 함께 즐기면 더욱 맛있습니다. 후쿠오카 파르코 지하에 위치해 접근성이 좋으며, 웨이팅이 길지만 그만큼 만족스러운 맛을 보장합니다. 신선한 소고기와 독특한 식감을 선호하는 분께 추천합니다.
data.location: 日本 〒810-0001 Fukuoka, Chuo Ward, Tenjin, 2-chōme−11−１ 福岡パルコ新館 B2F B202区画
data.menuInfo: Gyukatsu Set (130g, ¥1,500), Gyukatsu Set (260g, ¥2,300), Tororo (Grated Yam add-on, ¥100), Mentaiko (Spicy Cod Roe add-on, ¥200)
data.travelTips: You grill the gyukatsu to your preferred doneness on a personal hot stone grill. Try it with different sauces and salt. Expect a line, especially at lunch and dinner. Located in Parco B2F.
data.essentialItems: Be ready to cook your own meal, a keen eye for perfectly seared beef.

data.summary_en: Ganso Motsunabe Rakutenchi is a lively spot to experience Fukuoka's famous motsunabe. The hotpot, packed with tender beef offal and fresh vegetables in a rich broth, is incredibly satisfying and comforting. The atmosphere is bustling and authentic, perfect for a casual group meal. Be sure to order champon noodles at the end to enjoy the soup's full flavor. It's an essential Fukuoka culinary adventure.
data.summary_ko: 원조 모츠나베 라쿠텐치 텐진본점은 후쿠오카의 명물 모츠나베를 맛볼 수 있는 활기찬 곳입니다. 신선한 곱창과 채소가 어우러진 뜨끈한 전골은 깊고 진한 국물 맛이 일품입니다. 북적이는 현지 분위기에서 즐기는 모츠나베는 여행의 즐거움을 더해줍니다. 식사 후 짬뽕면이나 죽을 추가하여 국물까지 완벽하게 즐기는 것을 추천합니다.
data.location: 日本 〒810-0001 Fukuoka, Chuo Ward, Tenjin, 1-chōme−1−１ アクロス福岡 地下2階
data.menuInfo: Motsunabe (Soy Sauce or Miso base, per person, ¥1,600), Champon Noodles (add-on for hotpot, ¥400), Zosui (Rice Porridge add-on, ¥400), Gyoza (¥450)
data.travelTips: Motsunabe is a hotpot dish with beef or pork offal. Rakutenchi is very famous for it. Choose your broth (soy sauce or miso) and don't forget to add Champon noodles or Zosui at the end to soak up the delicious broth. Expect a lively, casual atmosphere. Reservations recommended for dinner.
data.essentialItems: Bring friends for a communal hotpot experience, a good appetite for flavorful offal.

data.summary_en: Imuri offers a sophisticated dining experience with creative Japanese cuisine and breathtaking panoramic views of Fukuoka. The dishes are artfully presented, showcasing premium seasonal ingredients with innovative techniques. From delicate sashimi to perfectly grilled meats, each plate is a culinary masterpiece. The elegant ambiance, attentive service, and stunning cityscape create an unforgettable evening, making Imuri a top choice for a memorable fine dining experience.
data.summary_ko: 이무리는 후쿠오카의 멋진 전경과 함께 창의적인 일본 요리를 즐길 수 있는 세련된 다이닝 경험을 제공합니다. 섬세한 사시미부터 완벽하게 구워진 육류까지, 제철 프리미엄 재료와 혁신적인 기법으로 아름답게 플레이팅된 모든 요리가 일품입니다. 우아한 분위기, 세심한 서비스, 그리고 아름다운 도시 풍경이 어우러져 잊을 수 없는 저녁을 선사하며, 기억에 남을 파인 다이닝을 위한 최고의 선택입니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday, Wednesday-Thursday: 11:30 AM - 2:30 PM, 5:00 PM - 11:00 PM; Tuesday: 5:00 PM - 11:00 PM; Friday-Saturday: 11:30 AM - 2:30 PM, 5:00 PM - 12:00 AM; Sunday: 11:30 AM - 2:30 PM, 5:00 PM - 11:00 PM
data.menuInfo:
- Seasonal Omakase Course (¥8000-¥15000)
- Kyushu Beef Steak (Price varies by cut)
- Sashimi Platter of Local Fish (¥3000-¥5000)
- Foie Gras Chawanmushi (¥1800)
- Seasonal Dessert Plate (¥1200)
data.travelTips: Imuri is known for its stunning city views from the terrace, especially at sunset, so request a window or terrace seat when booking. It's an ideal spot for a special occasion or a romantic dinner. The menu focuses on seasonal ingredients and creative Japanese cuisine.
data.essentialItems: A reservation is highly recommended, dress code is smart casual, and a camera for the panoramic views.

data.summary_en: Hyotan Sushi in Tenjin is a bustling, beloved spot offering incredibly fresh and expertly crafted sushi without an exorbitant price tag. The quality of the fish is outstanding, and each piece of nigiri melts in your mouth, showcasing the chef's skill. The atmosphere is lively and authentic, providing a genuine Japanese dining experience. It's a highly recommended destination for sushi lovers seeking both quality and value.
data.summary_ko: 텐진의 효탄 스시는 합리적인 가격에 매우 신선하고 훌륭하게 만들어진 스시를 제공하는, 번화하고 사랑받는 맛집입니다. 생선의 품질이 뛰어나고, 각 니기리 스시 조각이 입안에서 녹아내리며 셰프의 솜씨를 뽐냅니다. 활기차고 정통적인 분위기는 진정한 일본식 식사 경험을 선사합니다. 품질과 가치를 모두 추구하는 스시 애호가들에게 강력히 추천하는 곳입니다.
data.location: Japan, 〒810-0001 Fukuoka, Chuo Ward, Tenjin, 2-chōme−10−２０ Shintenkaku Building 2F
data.operatingHours: Monday - Sunday: 11:30 AM - 2:30 PM, 5:00 PM - 8:30 PM
data.menuInfo: Omakase Nigiri Set (8 pcs) (¥2,800), Assorted Sashimi (¥2,500), Chutoro Nigiri (¥600 per piece), Botan Ebi Nigiri (¥500 per piece), Miso Soup (¥300)
data.travelTips: Hyotan Sushi is a local favorite, known for its fresh ingredients and reasonable prices. Expect a wait, especially during peak lunch and dinner hours. Sitting at the counter allows you to watch the chefs prepare your sushi with precision.
data.essentialItems: Be prepared for a short wait, and consider trying the seasonal recommendations.

data.summary_en: Hakata Issou Main Store delivers an unforgettable tonkotsu ramen experience, renowned for its distinctive bubbly, creamy pork bone broth. The rich, deep umami flavor is perfectly balanced, avoiding excessive greasiness, and pairs wonderfully with the thin, firm noodles. The tender chashu pork slices are generously portioned and melt in your mouth. This spot offers a truly authentic taste of Hakata ramen that leaves a lasting impression.
data.summary_ko: 하카타 잇소우 본점은 독특한 거품이 있는 크리미한 돈코츠 육수로 잊을 수 없는 라멘 경험을 선사합니다. 진하고 깊은 감칠맛은 과도하게 기름지지 않으면서 완벽한 균형을 이루며, 얇고 쫄깃한 면과 환상적인 조화를 이룹니다. 부드러운 차슈 돼지고기는 푸짐하게 제공되며 입안에서 사르르 녹습니다. 하카타 라멘의 진정한 맛을 느낄 수 있는 곳으로, 깊은 인상을 남깁니다.
data.menuInfo: Special Tonkotsu Ramen (¥950), Tonkotsu Ramen (Standard) (¥800), Gyoza (5 pcs) (¥400), Kaedama (Noodle Refill) (¥150), Draft Beer (¥500)
data.travelTips: Hakata Issou is famous for its rich, frothy tonkotsu ramen. Don't be shy to ask for "kaedama" (noodle refill) if you finish your noodles before your broth. The broth is quite strong, so it's a must-try for tonkotsu aficionados.
data.essentialItems: Cash or card. A willingness to savor a hearty, flavorful ramen.

data.summary_en: Daitoen Main Store stands out as a premier yakiniku destination in Fukuoka, offering an exquisite selection of high-quality Japanese beef. The elegant and modern interior provides a comfortable ambiance for a luxurious dining experience. Each cut of meat is incredibly tender, bursting with flavor, and perfectly suited for grilling at your table. The attentive and professional service further elevates the meal, making it ideal for special occasions or indulging in premium wagyu.
data.summary_ko: 다이토엔 본점은 후쿠오카 최고의 야키니쿠 맛집으로, 최상급 일본 소고기를 맛볼 수 있는 곳입니다. 세련되고 현대적인 인테리어는 고급스러운 식사 경험을 위한 편안한 분위기를 제공합니다. 각 부위의 고기는 놀랍도록 부드럽고 풍미가 가득하며, 테이블에서 직접 구워 먹는 즐거움이 있습니다. 세심하고 전문적인 서비스는 식사의 만족도를 더욱 높여주며, 특별한 날이나 프리미엄 와규를 맛보기에 이상적입니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday - Friday: 11:30 AM - 2:00 PM, 4:00 PM - 10:30 PM; Saturday - Sunday: 11:30 AM - 10:30 PM
data.menuInfo: Premium Wagyu Assortment (¥7,500), Special Kalbi (Short Rib) (¥2,200), Harami (Skirt Steak) (¥1,800), Assorted Vegetables for Grill (¥900), Stone Pot Bibimbap (¥1,200)
data.travelTips: Daitoen is a well-regarded yakiniku restaurant. Reservations are highly recommended, especially for evening meals or larger groups, as it can get very busy. It’s a great place to enjoy high-quality Japanese beef in a sophisticated setting.
data.essentialItems: A reservation, if possible, and a desire for premium grilled meats.

data.summary_en: Canal City Hakata is a vibrant shopping and entertainment complex, renowned for its dynamic fountain shows and unique canal running through its heart. The atmosphere is lively and engaging, with a wide array of shops ranging from popular fashion brands to quirky souvenir stores. Dining options are extensive, particularly at the Ramen Stadium, offering diverse regional flavors. Service throughout the mall is typically polite and efficient, reflecting Japanese hospitality. It's a fantastic spot for both shopping and leisure.
data.summary_ko: 캐널시티 하카타는 활기찬 쇼핑 및 엔터테인먼트 복합 시설로, 중앙을 가로지르는 독특한 운하와 역동적인 분수 쇼로 유명합니다. 분위기는 활기차고 매력적이며, 인기 패션 브랜드부터 독특한 기념품 가게에 이르기까지 다양한 상점들이 있습니다. 특히 라멘 스타디움에서는 다양한 지역 라멘을 맛볼 수 있어 식사 옵션도 풍부합니다. 쇼핑몰 전반의 서비스는 일본의 환대를 반영하여 친절하고 효율적입니다. 쇼핑과 여가를 동시에 즐기기에 아주 좋은 장소입니다.
data.menuInfo: Japanese fashion brands, international retailers, ramen stadium dishes, character goods, themed cafes
data.travelTips: Catch the dynamic fountain shows and enjoy the canal-side atmosphere. Explore the Ramen Stadium for various regional ramen. Visit during weekdays to avoid larger crowds.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable shoes for walking, camera for photos, Yen for smaller purchases.

data.summary_en: The Tenjin Underground Shopping Center is a labyrinth of retail therapy, connecting major department stores and subway lines. Its charming European-inspired architecture creates a pleasant atmosphere, despite being underground. You'll discover a huge selection of shops, from trendy fashion boutiques to cosmetic stores and souvenir shops. The experience is seamless and convenient, perfect for escaping the elements while enjoying a wide variety of shopping and dining options. It feels clean and well-maintained.
data.summary_ko: 텐진 지하상가는 주요 백화점과 지하철 노선을 연결하는 거대한 쇼핑 공간입니다. 지하에 있지만 유럽풍 건축 디자인으로 쾌적한 분위기를 자랑합니다. 최신 유행 패션부터 화장품, 기념품까지 다양한 상점들을 만날 수 있습니다. 날씨에 상관없이 편리하게 쇼핑을 즐길 수 있으며, 깨끗하고 잘 관리되어 있습니다.
data.location: 2 Chome Tenjin, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka, 810-0001, Japan
data.menuInfo: Women's Fashion (¥2,000-¥15,000), Accessories & Jewelry (¥1,000-¥8,000), Cosmetics & Skincare (¥1,500-¥10,000), Specialty Goods (¥500-¥5,000)
data.travelTips: Connects directly to several department stores and subway stations, making it a convenient hub. Look for unique local boutiques and cafes. It's especially useful on rainy days.
data.essentialItems: Navigation app (it's vast!), reusable shopping bag, comfortable shoes for extensive walking.

data.summary_en: JR Hakata City Amu Plaza is a bustling shopping complex integrated into Hakata Station, making it an ideal first or last stop for travelers. The atmosphere is modern and energetic, offering an extensive range of shops catering to all tastes, from popular fashion brands to electronics and specialty stores. The dining options are superb, including the "Kooten" restaurant floor. The highlight is the rooftop garden with panoramic city views, providing a refreshing break from shopping.
data.summary_ko: JR 하카타 시티 아뮤 플라자는 하카타역과 바로 연결되어 있어 여행객들에게 매우 편리합니다. 현대적이고 활기찬 분위기에서 패션, 전자제품, 전문점 등 다양한 상점들을 만날 수 있습니다. "쿠텐" 식당가에서 훌륭한 식사를 즐길 수 있으며, 특히 옥상 정원에서는 파노라마 도시 전망을 감상하며 쇼핑의 피로를 풀 수 있습니다.
data.operatingHours: 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM daily (shops), 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM daily (restaurants)
data.menuInfo: Trendy Fashion Brands (¥4,000-¥25,000), Electronics & Gadgets (¥5,000-¥50,000), Character Goods (¥800-¥7,000), Gourmet Food & Souvenirs (¥500-¥4,000)
data.travelTips: Located directly above Hakata Station, it's incredibly convenient for travelers. Don't miss the rooftop garden, Tsubame-no-Mori Hiroba, for great city views and a small train ride.
data.essentialItems: Japan Rail Pass (if applicable), reusable bag, camera for rooftop views.

data.summary_en: Fukuoka Mitsukoshi is a prestigious department store offering a refined and upscale shopping experience in the heart of Tenjin. The atmosphere is elegant and sophisticated, attracting those with a taste for luxury. You'll find a curated selection of high-end fashion, cosmetics, and exquisite household goods. The service is impeccable, reflecting Japan's renowned hospitality. A true highlight is the "depachika" (basement food hall), a culinary paradise offering everything from artisanal sweets to gourmet meals, perfect for a luxurious treat.
data.summary_ko: 후쿠오카 미츠코시는 텐진 중심부에 위치한 명문 백화점으로, 세련되고 고급스러운 쇼핑 경험을 제공합니다. 우아하고 세련된 분위기 속에서 고급 패션, 화장품, 그리고 정교한 생활용품들을 만나볼 수 있습니다. 일본 특유의 훌륭한 서비스가 인상 깊으며, 특히 지하 식품관인 '데파치카'는 장인의 디저트부터 고급 식사에 이르기까지 미식의 천국입니다.
data.location: 2 Chome-1-1 Tenjin, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka, 810-8544, Japan
data.menuInfo: Luxury Apparel (¥10,000-¥200,000), Designer Bags & Accessories (¥20,000-¥500,000), High-End Cosmetics (¥5,000-¥30,000), Gourmet Food & Delicacies (¥1,000-¥10,000)
data.travelTips: Explore the basement food hall (Depachika) for an incredible selection of gourmet foods, bentos, and local delicacies. Excellent for finding high-quality gifts.
data.essentialItems: Credit card, formal attire (if dining at upscale restaurants), reusable bag for purchases.

data.summary_en: Marinoa City Fukuoka is a spacious outlet mall situated by Hakata Bay, offering a more relaxed shopping environment away from the city bustle. The atmosphere is open and airy, with a seaside feel, making it pleasant for a full day of browsing. Here, you can find a wide range of popular brands at discounted prices, from fashion to home goods. Beyond shopping, the iconic Ferris wheel provides fantastic panoramic views. It's an excellent destination for finding great deals and enjoying a scenic backdrop.
data.summary_ko: 마리노아 시티 후쿠오카는 하카타만에 위치한 넓은 아울렛 몰로, 도심의 번잡함에서 벗어나 여유로운 쇼핑을 즐길 수 있습니다. 개방적이고 시원한 바닷가 분위기가 하루 종일 쇼핑하기에 좋습니다. 패션부터 가정용품까지 다양한 인기 브랜드 제품들을 할인된 가격으로 만날 수 있습니다. 쇼핑 외에도 상징적인 관람차에서 멋진 파노라마 전망을 감상할 수 있습니다.
data.location: 2 Chome-12-30 Odo, Nishi Ward, Fukuoka, 819-0001, Japan
data.operatingHours: 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM daily (shops), 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM daily (restaurants, some may vary)
data.menuInfo: Outlet Fashion Brands (¥2,000-¥15,000), Sportswear & Outdoor Gear (¥3,000-¥10,000), Home Goods & Interior (¥1,000-¥8,000), Children's Apparel (¥1,500-¥7,000)
data.travelTips: Ideal for bargain hunting, as it is an outlet mall. Enjoy the Ferris wheel for great views of Hakata Bay and the city. It's a bit further out, so plan transportation accordingly.
data.essentialItems: Public transportation pass, comfortable shoes for walking between stores, a large reusable shopping bag for deals.

data.summary_en: LaLaport Fukuoka is a modern and spacious shopping mall, most notably recognized for its towering, life-sized Gundam statue standing proudly outside. The interior offers a clean and contemporary atmosphere, housing a vast selection of shops from fashion to lifestyle goods, catering to a diverse demographic. The food court is extensive, providing numerous culinary choices. It’s an ideal spot for families, especially those with children, offering entertainment beyond just shopping. The overall service is efficient, reflecting the high standards of Japanese retail.
data.summary_ko: 라라포트 후쿠오카는 실물 크기의 건담 동상이 인상적인 현대적이고 넓은 쇼핑몰입니다. 깔끔하고 현대적인 분위기 속에서 패션부터 라이프스타일 용품까지 다양한 상점들을 만나볼 수 있습니다. 푸드코트도 매우 넓어 다채로운 음식들을 맛볼 수 있습니다. 가족 단위 방문객, 특히 어린이를 동반한 가족에게 이상적인 장소로, 쇼핑 외에도 다양한 즐거움을 제공합니다. 전반적인 서비스는 효율적이며 일본 소매업의 높은 기준을 잘 보여줍니다.
data.menuInfo: Apparel (prices vary), Lifestyle goods (prices vary), Gundam model kits (¥2000-¥10000), Food court meals (¥800-¥1500)
data.travelTips: Don't miss the life-size RX-93ff ν Gundam statue outside for amazing photos. The mall offers a wide range of shops and a large food court. It's relatively new, so expect modern facilities.
data.essentialItems: Camera for the Gundam statue, comfortable shoes, credit card.

data.summary_en: AMU Plaza Hakata is a vibrant shopping mall seamlessly integrated with Hakata Station, making it an incredibly convenient stop for both locals and tourists. The atmosphere is upscale and bustling, featuring a wide selection of trendy fashion brands, electronics, and gourmet food shops. Service is generally efficient and polished, reflecting its premium offerings. Beyond shopping, the rooftop garden provides a relaxing escape with panoramic city views, adding a unique charm to this modern retail hub. It's perfect for a full day of shopping and dining.
data.summary_ko: 아뮤플라자 하카타는 하카타역과 바로 연결되어 있어 현지인과 관광객 모두에게 매우 편리한 활기찬 쇼핑몰입니다. 트렌디한 패션 브랜드, 전자제품, 고급 식료품점 등 다양한 상점들이 입점해 있으며, 고급스럽고 번화한 분위기를 자랑합니다. 서비스는 일반적으로 효율적이고 세련된 편입니다. 쇼핑 외에도 옥상 정원에서 파노라마 도시 전망과 함께 휴식을 취할 수 있어 이 현대적인 쇼핑 허브에 독특한 매력을 더합니다. 하루 종일 쇼핑과 식사를 즐기기에 완벽한 곳입니다.
data.menuInfo: Fashion brands (prices vary), Electronics (prices vary), Gourmet food items (prices vary), Restaurant dining (¥1500-¥5000)
data.travelTips: Located directly above Hakata Station, it's incredibly convenient for travelers. Offers a wide range of upscale fashion and gourmet food. Don't miss the rooftop garden for panoramic city views.
data.essentialItems: Credit card, comfortable shoes, camera for the rooftop garden.

data.summary_en: Solaria Plaza, situated in the bustling Tenjin district, is a sophisticated shopping complex offering nine floors of retail, dining, and entertainment. The atmosphere is chic and modern, attracting those looking for international fashion brands and unique Japanese designs. The dining options range from casual cafes to more refined restaurants, and there's also a cinema for entertainment. Service across the stores is generally polite and helpful. It’s a versatile destination for a complete urban shopping and leisure experience.
data.summary_ko: 번화한 텐진 지구에 위치한 솔라리아 플라자는 9층 규모의 세련된 쇼핑, 다이닝, 엔터테인먼트 복합 시설입니다. 세련되고 현대적인 분위기로 국제 패션 브랜드와 독특한 일본 디자인을 찾는 이들에게 인기가 많습니다. 식사 옵션은 캐주얼 카페부터 고급 레스토랑까지 다양하며, 영화관도 갖추고 있습니다. 매장들의 서비스는 대체로 친절하고 도움이 됩니다. 완벽한 도시 쇼핑 및 여가 경험을 위한 다재다능한 장소입니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday-Friday: 11:00 AM - 8:00 PM, Saturday-Sunday: 10:00 AM - 8:00 PM
data.menuInfo: International fashion brands (prices vary), Japanese designer items (prices vary), Cafe drinks (¥500-¥900), Cinema tickets (¥1500-¥2000)
data.travelTips: Located in the heart of Tenjin, it's easily accessible and connected to other shopping areas. Great for fashion-forward items and has a cinema and various dining options.
data.essentialItems: Credit card, comfortable walking shoes.

data.name_en: Blue Bottle Coffee Fukuoka Tenjin Store
data.summary_en: Blue Bottle Coffee in Tenjin offers a serene escape with its signature minimalist design and expertly prepared coffee. The pour-over is a must-try, boasting rich and nuanced flavors. Service is efficient and friendly, maintaining the brand's high standards. It's a perfect spot to savor a quiet moment or meet friends, truly embodying a sophisticated coffee experience in Fukuoka.
data.summary_ko: 텐진의 블루보틀 커피는 특유의 미니멀한 디자인과 전문적으로 준비된 커피로 평온한 휴식을 제공합니다. 핸드드립 커피는 깊고 미묘한 맛으로 꼭 시도해볼 만합니다. 서비스는 효율적이고 친절하며, 브랜드의 높은 기준을 유지합니다. 후쿠오카에서 세련된 커피 경험을 만끽하거나 친구들과 만남을 가지기에 완벽한 장소입니다.
data.sourceTitle: Blue Bottle Coffee Fukuoka Tenjin Store
data.menuInfo: Drip Coffee (¥550), Latte (¥650), Espresso (¥500), Waffle (¥450), Financier (¥350)
data.travelTips: Enjoy the minimalist design and high-quality coffee. It can get busy, so consider visiting during off-peak hours. The outdoor seating offers a pleasant spot for people-watching in Tenjin.
data.essentialItems: Camera for capturing the aesthetic, a comfortable book for a relaxing afternoon.

data.summary_en: SORA COFFEE is a delightful gem near Canal City, boasting a fantastic 4.8 rating. Their expertly brewed coffee, especially the drip, is smooth and aromatic, perfect for a discerning palate. The atmosphere is calm and inviting, providing a wonderful respite from the bustling city. Service is personal and warm, adding to the charm. It's an ideal spot for coffee lovers seeking quality and tranquility.
data.summary_ko: 캐널시티 근처에 위치한 소라 커피는 환상적인 4.8점 평점을 자랑하는 즐거운 보석 같은 곳입니다. 특히 드립 커피는 부드럽고 향긋하며, 까다로운 입맛에도 완벽하게 어울립니다. 분위기는 조용하고 매력적이며, 번화한 도시에서 벗어나 훌륭한 휴식을 제공합니다. 개인적이고 따뜻한 서비스는 이곳의 매력을 더합니다. 품질과 고요함을 찾는 커피 애호가에게 이상적인 장소입니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday-Friday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Saturday: 2:00 PM - 6:00 PM, Sunday: Closed
data.menuInfo: Drip Coffee (¥600), Cafe Latte (¥650), Americano (¥580), Homemade Cookie (¥300), Pound Cake (¥400)
data.travelTips: Located near Canal City and Kushida Shrine, making it a great stop during sightseeing. The space is cozy, perfect for a quiet coffee break.
data.essentialItems: Cash or credit card, a small notebook to jot down travel memories.

data.summary_en: CONNECT COFFEE in Tenjin is a well-regarded spot for specialty coffee lovers, evident from its solid 4.5 rating. The ambiance is modern and inviting, providing a comfortable space for both quick stops and longer stays. Their baristas are skilled, crafting excellent lattes and precise hand-drip coffees. It's a fantastic choice for those seeking a quality coffee experience amidst the city's energy.
data.summary_ko: 텐진의 커넥트 커피는 훌륭한 4.5점 평점을 받은 스페셜티 커피 애호가들을 위한 명소입니다. 현대적이고 매력적인 분위기는 잠깐 들르거나 오래 머물기에도 편안한 공간을 제공합니다. 숙련된 바리스타들이 훌륭한 라떼와 정확한 핸드드립 커피를 만듭니다. 도시의 에너지 속에서 수준 높은 커피 경험을 찾는 이들에게 환상적인 선택입니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday, Wednesday-Friday: 12:00 PM - 8:00 PM, Saturday: 12:00 PM - 8:00 PM, Sunday: 11:00 AM - 6:00 PM, Tuesday: Closed
data.menuInfo: Espresso (¥450), Cafe Latte (¥580), Hand Drip Coffee (¥650), Cheesecake (¥500), Cookies (¥300)
data.travelTips: A popular spot in the Tenjin area, known for its focus on specialty coffee. It can be a great place to work or relax. Check their social media for any seasonal offerings.
data.essentialItems: Laptop or book, comfortable shoes for exploring Tenjin, payment methods.

data.summary_en: Cafe Miel, nestled near Hakata Station, is a highly-rated haven with a pleasant 4.6 score. It's a convenient spot for travelers, offering a comfortable atmosphere to unwind. The coffee is consistently good, and their light lunch and dessert options are perfect for a quick bite. The service is friendly and efficient, catering well to both locals and tourists looking for a quality cafe experience.
data.summary_ko: 하카타역 근처에 자리한 카페 미엘은 4.6점이라는 높은 평점을 받은 즐거운 안식처입니다. 여행객들에게 편리한 위치에 있으며, 편안한 분위기에서 휴식을 취할 수 있습니다. 커피는 항상 훌륭하며, 가벼운 점심과 디저트 옵션은 간단한 식사를 즐기기에 완벽합니다. 친절하고 효율적인 서비스는 현지인과 관광객 모두에게 만족스러운 카페 경험을 제공합니다.
data.location: B2F, Fukuoka Center Building, 2-chōme-2-1 Hakata Ekimae, Hakata Ward, Fukuoka, 812-0011, Japan
data.operatingHours: Monday-Friday: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM, Saturday-Sunday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
data.menuInfo: Blended Coffee (¥500), Cafe Latte (¥620), Tea (¥550), Sandwich Set (¥850), Cake of the Day (¥480)
data.travelTips: Conveniently located in the Fukuoka Center Building near Hakata Station, making it perfect for a quick breakfast or a relaxed break before/after train travel. It can get busy during peak hours.
data.essentialItems: Commuter pass, a good book or travel guide, payment methods.

data.summary_en: Coffee County Fukuoka is a true haven for coffee connoisseurs, boasting an impressive 4.6 rating. Known for its exceptional single-origin beans and masterful brewing, every cup is a journey of flavor. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, perfect for delving into the world of specialty coffee. The baristas are passionate and happy to guide you through their selections, ensuring a memorable and educational coffee experience.
data.summary_ko: 커피카운티 후쿠오카점은 4.6점이라는 인상적인 평점을 자랑하는 커피 애호가들을 위한 진정한 안식처입니다. 탁월한 싱글 오리진 원두와 뛰어난 추출 기술로 유명하며, 한 잔 한 잔이 풍미의 여정입니다. 따뜻하고 매력적인 분위기는 스페셜티 커피의 세계에 빠져들기에 완벽합니다. 바리스타들은 열정적이며, 다양한 원두 선택을 통해 기억에 남는 교육적인 커피 경험을 선사합니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday, Tuesday, Thursday-Sunday: 10:00 AM - 6:30 PM, Wednesday: Closed
data.menuInfo: Single Origin Drip (¥700), Espresso Tonic (¥680), Cafe Latte (¥620), Baked Goods (¥350-¥500), Coffee Beans (various prices)
data.travelTips: A must-visit for serious coffee enthusiasts. The staff are very knowledgeable about their beans and brewing methods. Consider buying a bag of their roasted beans to take home.
data.essentialItems: An appreciation for specialty coffee, cash or credit card, a reusable coffee cup if you prefer.

data.summary_en: Blue Bottle Coffee in Tenjin offers a minimalist yet inviting atmosphere, perfect for a peaceful coffee break. The staff are knowledgeable and provide excellent service, crafting each cup with precision. Their signature pour-over coffees boast exceptional flavor and aroma, while the New Orleans Iced Coffee is a refreshing treat. Pair your drink with a freshly baked waffle for a delightful experience. It’s a reliable spot for high-quality coffee lovers.
data.summary_ko: 텐진 블루보틀 커피는 미니멀하면서도 매력적인 분위기로 평화로운 커피 휴식에 완벽합니다. 직원들은 친절하고 전문적이며, 각 커피를 정성껏 만듭니다. 시그니처 핸드드립 커피는 탁월한 맛과 향을 자랑하며, 뉴올리언스 아이스 커피는 상쾌한 즐거움을 선사합니다. 갓 구운 와플과 함께 맛있는 경험을 해보세요. 고품질 커피를 좋아하는 분들에게 믿을 수 있는 장소입니다.
data.menuInfo:
- Single Origin Drip Coffee (¥600-800)
- New Orleans Iced Coffee (¥600)
- Espresso (¥550)
- Waffle (¥500)
- Pastries (¥400-700)
data.travelTips: Visit early in the morning for a quieter experience or grab a coffee to go and enjoy it at nearby Kego Park. Expect a queue during peak hours.
data.essentialItems: Cash or credit card, a reusable cup for eco-conscious travelers.

data.summary_en: Manly offers a charming Australian vibe in the heart of Fukuoka, with a rustic interior and inviting outdoor tables. The staff are warm and welcoming, contributing to a relaxed dining experience. Their ricotta pancakes are a must-try, fluffy and perfectly sweet. The savory meat pies and hearty brunch options are also excellent. It's a fantastic spot to enjoy a leisurely meal and some excellent coffee in a vibrant setting.
data.summary_ko: 맨리는 후쿠오카 한가운데에서 매력적인 호주 분위기를 선사하며, 소박한 인테리어와 매력적인 야외 테이블을 갖추고 있습니다. 직원들은 따뜻하고 환영하며, 편안한 식사 경험을 제공합니다. 이곳의 리코타 팬케이크는 꼭 먹어봐야 할 메뉴로, 폭신하고 완벽하게 달콤합니다. 고소한 미트 파이와 든든한 브런치 메뉴도 훌륭합니다. 활기찬 분위기에서 여유로운 식사와 훌륭한 커피를 즐기기에 좋은 곳입니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday-Thursday, Sunday: 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM; Friday-Saturday: 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM
data.menuInfo:
- Ricotta Pancakes (¥1200-1500)
- Eggs Benedict (¥1300-1600)
- Meat Pie (¥800-1000)
- Flat White (¥600)
- Fresh Juices (¥700-900)
data.travelTips: This Australian-themed cafe is popular for brunch. Reservations are recommended, especially on weekends, to secure outdoor seating and enjoy the lively atmosphere. It's dog-friendly, so feel free to bring your furry friends.
data.essentialItems: Camera for the picturesque food, appetite for hearty portions.

data.summary_en: REC Coffee Hakata provides a sophisticated atmosphere with panoramic views of Hakata Station, especially from its window seats. The baristas are highly skilled, evident in their beautiful latte art and expertly prepared hand-drip coffees. Service is efficient and friendly, making it a pleasant experience even during busy times. Their coffee is rich and flavorful, and pairing it with a delicate cheesecake makes for a perfect afternoon treat. It’s a fantastic urban retreat for coffee enthusiasts.
data.summary_ko: REC 커피 하카타점은 특히 창가 좌석에서 하카타 역의 탁 트인 전망과 함께 세련된 분위기를 제공합니다. 바리스타는 아름다운 라떼 아트와 숙련된 핸드드립 커피로 뛰어난 기술을 보여줍니다. 서비스는 효율적이고 친절하여 바쁜 시간에도 즐거운 경험을 선사합니다. 풍부하고 맛있는 커피와 섬세한 치즈케이크는 완벽한 오후 간식입니다. 커피 애호가들에게 훌륭한 도시 휴식처입니다.
data.menuInfo:
- Latte Art Coffee (¥550-700)
- Hand Drip Coffee (¥600-900)
- Espresso (¥500)
- Cheesecake (¥500-600)
- Scone (¥350-450)
data.travelTips: Located on the 6th floor of Kitte Hakata, it offers great views of Hakata Station. It's a perfect spot for a coffee break while shopping or waiting for a train. Grab a window seat if possible.
data.essentialItems: Train tickets if you're traveling, a good book to read.

data.summary_en: Cafe Motito is a hidden gem near Canal City, offering a peaceful and cozy ambiance on its 4th-floor location. The staff are incredibly kind and attentive, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Their organic coffee is exceptionally smooth, and the homemade cakes are delightful. It's a wonderful place to enjoy a healthy and delicious meal, with excellent vegetarian options. The late closing hours on weekends are a definite plus for those seeking a quiet evening spot.
data.summary_ko: 카페 모티토는 캐널시티 근처의 숨겨진 보석 같은 곳으로, 4층에 위치하여 평화롭고 아늑한 분위기를 제공합니다. 직원들은 매우 친절하고 세심하여 따뜻하고 환영하는 분위기를 조성합니다. 유기농 커피는 유난히 부드럽고, 직접 만든 케이크는 정말 맛있습니다. 건강하고 맛있는 식사를 즐기기에 훌륭한 장소이며, 훌륭한 채식 옵션도 있습니다. 주말 늦은 시간까지 운영하는 것은 조용한 저녁 장소를 찾는 사람들에게 확실한 장점입니다.
data.location: 1-chōme-5-1 Sumiyoshi, Hakata Ward, Fukuoka, 812-0018 Japan, 4F Sundance
data.operatingHours: Monday-Thursday, Sunday: 11:45 AM - 11:00 PM; Friday: 12:00 PM - 2:00 AM; Saturday: 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM
data.menuInfo:
- Organic Coffee (¥550-700)
- Homemade Cake Set (¥1000-1200)
- Herbal Tea (¥600-800)
- Vegetarian Lunch Plate (¥1200-1500)
- Fruit Parfait (¥900-1100)
data.travelTips: This cafe is known for its organic and vegetarian-friendly options, making it a great choice for health-conscious travelers. It's open late on Fridays and Saturdays, perfect for an evening dessert or a relaxed drink. Cash-only establishment, so prepare accordingly.
data.essentialItems: Cash, a relaxed mindset, and an open mind for unique menu items.

data.summary_en: Fuglen Fukuoka brings a touch of Oslo's renowned coffee culture to Hakata, with its chic, minimalist interior and a vibrant, yet relaxed atmosphere. The baristas are true professionals, dedicated to serving perfectly brewed coffee. Their filter coffees are a highlight, showcasing distinct and nuanced flavors. In the evenings, it transforms into a bar offering craft beers. It's an ideal spot for those who appreciate meticulously crafted beverages and a stylish environment.
data.summary_ko: 후글렌 후쿠오카는 시크하고 미니멀한 인테리어와 활기차면서도 편안한 분위기로 오슬로의 유명한 커피 문화를 하카타에 선사합니다. 바리스타들은 완벽하게 추출된 커피를 제공하는 데 전념하는 진정한 전문가입니다. 특히 필터 커피는 독특하고 미묘한 풍미를 자랑합니다. 저녁에는 수제 맥주를 제공하는 바로 변신합니다. 꼼꼼하게 만들어진 음료와 세련된 환경을 좋아하는 분들에게 이상적인 장소입니다.
data.location: 1-chōme-18-33 Hakataekihigashi, Hakata Ward, Fukuoka, 812-0013 Japan, Hakata East Terrace 1F
data.operatingHours: Monday-Thursday: 7:00 AM - 8:00 PM; Friday: 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM; Saturday-Sunday: 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM
data.menuInfo:
- Espresso Based Drinks (Latte, Cappuccino) (¥550-750)
- Filter Coffee (¥650-900)
- Norwegian Waffle (¥600)
- Local Craft Beer (¥800-1000)
- Seasonal Pastries (¥400-600)
data.travelTips: Fuglen is a renowned Oslo-based coffee shop, famous for its high-quality coffee and stylish, minimalist design. It's a great place to experience world-class coffee culture. They also serve craft beer in the evenings.
data.essentialItems: An appreciation for fine coffee, a camera for the aesthetic interior.

data.summary_en: Dazaifu Tenmangu Shrine offers a serene and culturally rich experience. The grounds are beautifully maintained with vibrant plum trees and a tranquil pond, creating a peaceful atmosphere. While there isn't food service directly at the shrine, the surrounding streets are bustling with vendors selling delicious Umegae Mochi, a local specialty. The overall visit provides a deep dive into Japanese tradition and architectural beauty, making it a must-visit for its spiritual ambiance and historical significance.
data.summary_ko: 다자이후 텐만구는 고즈넉하고 문화적으로 풍성한 경험을 선사합니다. 아름답게 가꿔진 경내에는 매화나무와 고요한 연못이 어우러져 평화로운 분위기를 자아냅니다. 신사 자체에 식사 공간은 없지만, 주변 거리에서 맛있는 지역 특산물인 우메가에 모치를 맛볼 수 있습니다. 일본 전통과 건축미를 깊이 느낄 수 있는 곳으로, 그 영적인 분위기와 역사적 중요성 때문에 꼭 방문해야 할 명소입니다.
data.menuInfo: Umegae Mochi (plum cake, ¥130-150), Omamori (charms, ¥500-2000), Ema (prayer plaques, ¥500-1000)
data.travelTips: Visit early morning to avoid crowds. Don't forget to rub the head of the sacred ox statue for good luck and wisdom. Explore the beautiful gardens and pond.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable walking shoes, camera, small change for offerings/charms.

data.summary_en: Ohori Park and Fukuoka Castle Ruins offer a perfect blend of natural beauty and historical intrigue. The sprawling park with its large central lake is ideal for leisurely strolls, jogging, or boat rides, providing a tranquil escape from the city bustle. The adjacent castle ruins, though mostly foundations, provide a glimpse into Fukuoka's past and offer panoramic views. The atmosphere is refreshing and serene, making it a favorite spot for both locals and tourists seeking relaxation and a touch of history.
data.summary_ko: 오호리 공원과 후쿠오카 성터는 자연의 아름다움과 역사적 흥미가 완벽하게 조화된 곳입니다. 넓은 공원은 커다란 중앙 호수를 중심으로 산책, 조깅, 보트 타기를 즐기기에 이상적이며, 도시의 번잡함에서 벗어나 고요함을 선사합니다. 인접한 성터는 대부분 기초만 남아있지만, 후쿠오카의 과거를 엿볼 수 있으며 탁 트인 전망을 제공합니다. 상쾌하고 평온한 분위기로, 휴식과 역사를 찾는 현지인과 관광객 모두에게 사랑받는 명소입니다.
data.location: Ohori Park: 1 Ōhorikōen, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka, 810-0051, Japan; Fukuoka Castle Ruins: 1-1 Jōnai, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka, 810-0043, Japan
data.operatingHours: Ohori Park: 24 hours daily; Fukuoka Castle Ruins: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM daily
data.ticketInfo: Free (for park and ruins). Boat rental (¥600-1000), Fukuoka Art Museum (¥200-500)
data.menuInfo: Starbucks Ohori Park (Coffee ¥400-600, Pastries ¥300-500), Boat Rental (Rowboat ¥600/30min, Pedal boat ¥1000/30min)
data.travelTips: Combine your visit with the Fukuoka Art Museum located within Ohori Park. Rent a boat on the lake for a relaxing experience. Visit during cherry blossom season (late March/early April) for stunning views.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable walking shoes, picnic blanket, camera, sunglasses/hat.

data.name_en: Kushida Shrine & Hakata Gion Yamakasa Kazariyama Exhibition
data.name_ko: 구시다 신사 & 하카타 기온 야마카사 가자리야마 전시
data.summary_en: Kushida Shrine is a spiritual heart of Hakata, steeped in history and tradition. The atmosphere is solemn yet welcoming, with intricate carvings and vibrant decorations. While there's no direct food service, the shrine offers fascinating cultural items like omamori. The highlight is the permanent exhibition of the magnificent Yamakasa festival floats, showcasing incredible craftsmanship. The serene environment and rich cultural insights make it a truly enriching visit, offering a glimpse into Fukuoka's enduring traditions.
data.summary_ko: 구시다 신사는 하카타의 영적인 심장이자 깊은 역사와 전통이 살아 숨 쉬는 곳입니다. 정교한 조각과 화려한 장식으로 꾸며진 경내는 엄숙하면서도 따뜻한 분위기를 자아냅니다. 직접적인 식음료 서비스는 없지만, 부적과 같은 흥미로운 문화 상품을 만날 수 있습니다. 가장 인상적인 것은 화려한 야마카사 축제 장식 수레의 상설 전시로, 놀라운 장인정신을 엿볼 수 있습니다. 고요한 환경과 풍부한 문화적 통찰력은 후쿠오카의 변치 않는 전통을 엿볼 수 있는 진정으로 풍요로운 방문을 선사합니다.
data.sourceTitle: Kushida Shrine & Hakata Gion Yamakasa Kazariyama Exhibition
data.operatingHours: Shrine: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM daily. Yamakasa Exhibition: 24 hours (viewable from outside, main floats).
data.ticketInfo: Free (for shrine and permanent Yamakasa floats viewing).
data.menuInfo: Omikuji (fortune slip, ¥100-200), Omamori (charms, ¥500-2000), Local street snacks nearby (e.g., mochi, senbei, ¥200-500)
data.travelTips: Visit in July to experience the Hakata Gion Yamakasa Festival if possible. Year-round, you can see the impressive Kazariyama (decorative floats). Take a moment to purify your hands and mouth at the temizuya before approaching the main shrine.
data.essentialItems: Respectful attire, camera, small change for offerings/fortune slips.

data.summary_en: Fukuoka Tower offers unparalleled panoramic views of Fukuoka city and Hakata Bay, making it an essential stop for any visitor. The atmosphere on the observation deck is lively, especially during sunset when the city lights begin to twinkle. While the primary attraction is the view, there's a pleasant souvenir shop and a cafe for light refreshments. The service at the ticket counter and elevator is efficient, ensuring a smooth experience from base to summit. It's a fantastic spot to gain perspective on the city's layout and natural surroundings.
data.summary_ko: 후쿠오카 타워는 후쿠오카 시내와 하카타 만의 탁 트인 전망을 제공하여 모든 방문객에게 필수적인 명소입니다. 특히 해 질 녘 도시의 불빛이 반짝이기 시작할 때 전망대 분위기는 활기차고 아름답습니다. 주된 매력은 물론 경치지만, 기념품 가게와 가벼운 다과를 즐길 수 있는 카페도 있습니다. 티켓 카운터와 엘리베이터 서비스는 효율적이어서 바닥에서 정상까지 원활한 경험을 보장합니다. 도시의 전경과 자연 환경을 한눈에 담기에 환상적인 장소입니다.
data.ticketInfo: Adults ¥800, Children (Junior High & Elementary) ¥500, Infants (4 years & older) ¥200
data.menuInfo: Souvenir Shop (local snacks, merchandise, ¥300-2000), Sky Cafe & Dining Reflé (Coffee ¥500-700, Light meals ¥800-1500)
data.travelTips: Visit around sunset for breathtaking views of the city transforming from day to night. Take photos with the romantic "Lover's Sanctuary" on the observation deck. Explore Momochihama Beach nearby.
data.essentialItems: Camera, money for entrance fee and souvenirs, perhaps a light jacket if visiting at night.

data.summary_en: Ohori Park is a tranquil oasis in the heart of Fukuoka, offering a refreshing escape from the urban bustle. The expansive lake is perfect for a leisurely stroll or an invigorating jog, with beautiful scenery changing with the seasons. Boat rentals are available for those who wish to enjoy the water. The park's peaceful atmosphere, combined with its well-maintained paths and surrounding nature, makes it ideal for relaxation and photography.
data.summary_ko: 오호리 공원은 후쿠오카 도심 속 평화로운 오아시스 같은 곳입니다. 드넓은 호수를 따라 산책하거나 조깅하기 좋고, 계절마다 변하는 아름다운 풍경을 즐길 수 있습니다. 보트 대여도 가능하여 물 위에서 여유로운 시간을 보낼 수도 있습니다. 잘 정돈된 산책로와 자연이 어우러져 휴식과 사진 촬영에 최적의 장소입니다.
data.menuInfo: N/A
data.travelTips: Rent a boat on the lake during warmer months. Enjoy a leisurely walk or jog around the lake. Visit the Japanese garden inside the park for a small fee.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable walking shoes, camera, water bottle, a light jacket if visiting in cooler weather.

data.summary_en: Kushida Shrine is a spiritual heart of Hakata, steeped in history and tradition. This ancient shrine is particularly famous as the home of the Hakata Gion Yamakasa festival, with magnificent floats on display year-round. The atmosphere is serene yet vibrant, offering a glimpse into local Shinto practices and artistry. It's a must-visit for its cultural significance and beautiful, intricate details.
data.summary_ko: 구시다 신사는 하카타의 정신적 중심지이며 깊은 역사와 전통이 살아 숨 쉬는 곳입니다. 특히 하카타 기온 야마카사 축제의 본거지로, 웅장한 가마들이 일 년 내내 전시되어 있습니다. 고요하면서도 활기찬 분위기 속에서 일본 신도 문화와 예술을 엿볼 수 있습니다. 문화적 중요성과 아름다운 세부 장식 덕분에 꼭 방문해야 할 장소입니다.
data.menuInfo: N/A
data.travelTips: Visit during the Hakata Gion Yamakasa festival in July to experience the vibrant floats. Look for the ornate Kagura-den stage and the large Yamakasa floats displayed year-round.
data.essentialItems: Respectful attire, camera, yen for charms/souvenirs if desired.

data.summary_en: Tochoji Temple is a significant Buddhist site renowned for its impressive Fukuoka Daibutsu, a huge wooden seated Buddha statue. The temple grounds are peaceful and well-maintained, featuring a striking five-storied pagoda. It offers a tranquil escape and a profound cultural experience, allowing visitors to appreciate traditional Japanese Buddhist architecture and art. The sheer scale of the Daibutsu is truly awe-inspiring.
data.summary_ko: 동장사는 거대한 목조 불상인 후쿠오카 대불로 유명한 중요한 불교 사찰입니다. 사찰 경내는 평화롭고 잘 관리되어 있으며, 인상적인 5층 목탑도 볼 수 있습니다. 전통적인 일본 불교 건축과 예술을 감상할 수 있는 고요하고 깊이 있는 문화 체험을 제공합니다. 대불의 웅장함은 정말 경외감을 자아냅니다.
data.menuInfo: N/A
data.travelTips: Don't miss the Fukuoka Daibutsu (Great Buddha) inside the main hall. Explore the beautifully maintained grounds and the five-storied pagoda.
data.essentialItems: Camera, respectful demeanor, comfortable shoes.

data.summary_en: The Fukuoka Castle Ruins, nestled within the expansive Maizuru Park, offer a fascinating glimpse into the region's samurai past. While only remnants of the castle walls and a few turrets remain, the site provides a serene historical walk with excellent views over the city. It's particularly beautiful during cherry blossom season, making it a popular spot for both history enthusiasts and nature lovers seeking tranquility amidst urban Fukuoka.
data.summary_ko: 마이즈루 공원 안에 자리한 후쿠오카 성터는 이 지역의 사무라이 시대로의 흥미로운 여정을 제공합니다. 성벽과 몇몇 망루의 잔해만 남아있지만, 이 유적지는 도시를 조망할 수 있는 훌륭한 전망과 함께 평화로운 역사 산책을 선사합니다. 특히 벚꽃 시즌에는 매우 아름다워, 역사 애호가와 도시 속 평온을 찾는 자연 애호가 모두에게 인기 있는 장소입니다.
data.operatingHours: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM (Ruins area); Park is 24 hours
data.menuInfo: N/A
data.travelTips: Visit during spring for stunning cherry blossoms. Climb the various stone walls for different perspectives of the ruins and city. Combine with a visit to Ohori Park, which is adjacent.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable walking shoes (lots of walking and climbing), camera, water bottle, a picnic if planning to relax in the park.

data.summary_en: Hakata Port Tower provides an excellent, free opportunity to capture breathtaking panoramic views of Fukuoka city and Hakata Bay. The observation deck, though not overly high, offers a clear perspective of the urban landscape, the bustling port, and distant islands. It's a perfect spot for photography, especially during golden hour. Located within the lively Bayside Place Hakata Wharf, visitors can combine their visit with exploring local shops, enjoying fresh seafood, or even visiting an aquarium. It’s a rewarding stop for budget-conscious travelers seeking scenic vistas.
data.summary_ko: 하카타 포트 타워는 후쿠오카 시와 하카타만을 한눈에 조망할 수 있는 훌륭하고 무료 전망대입니다. 높지 않지만 도시 경관, 분주한 항구, 그리고 멀리 보이는 섬들의 모습을 선명하게 볼 수 있습니다. 특히 해질녘 사진을 찍기에 완벽한 장소입니다. 활기찬 베이사이드 플레이스 하카타 워프 내에 위치하여, 지역 상점을 둘러보거나 신선한 해산물을 즐기거나 수족관을 방문하는 등 다양한 활동과 함께 즐길 수 있습니다. 아름다운 경치를 찾는 실속형 여행자에게 보람 있는 곳입니다.
data.menuInfo:
Coffee (Bayside Place Hakata Wharf cafes): ¥400-600
Soft Drinks (Bayside Place Hakata Wharf cafes): ¥300-500
Local Snacks (Bayside Place Hakata Wharf shops): ¥200-800
data.travelTips: The observation deck offers fantastic panoramic views of Hakata Bay, Fukuoka city, and the surrounding islands, especially at sunset. It's located within the Bayside Place Hakata Wharf complex, which has an aquarium, restaurants, and shops. Great for a quick, free viewpoint and some light shopping or dining afterwards.
data.essentialItems: Camera, binoculars (optional).

data.summary_en: Nokonoshima Island Park is a vibrant, floral paradise offering breathtaking seasonal displays against the backdrop of Hakata Bay. From rapeseed blossoms and cherry trees in spring to cosmos and sunflowers in autumn, the park is a kaleidoscope of colors throughout the year. Beyond the stunning flower fields, there are charming cafes, picnic areas, and even a small zoo, making it a delightful day trip for families and nature lovers. The tranquil ferry ride to the island adds to the charm, promising a refreshing escape from the city.
data.summary_ko: 노코노시마 아일랜드 파크는 하카타만을 배경으로 계절마다 숨막히는 꽃밭을 선사하는 활기찬 꽃의 낙원입니다. 봄에는 유채꽃과 벚꽃, 가을에는 코스모스와 해바라기 등 일년 내내 다채로운 색상으로 빛납니다. 멋진 꽃밭 외에도 매력적인 카페, 피크닉 공간, 작은 동물원까지 있어 가족과 자연을 사랑하는 사람들에게 즐거운 당일치기 여행지입니다. 섬으로 향하는 고요한 페리 탑승은 도시의 번잡함에서 벗어나는 상쾌한 매력을 더합니다.
data.operatingHours: 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM (March-November); 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM (December-February); until 6:30 PM on weekends/holidays in peak season
data.ticketInfo: Adults ¥1200; Children (Junior high school students) ¥600; Children (3 years old to elementary school students) ¥400
data.menuInfo:
Nokonoshima Udon (Local udon noodles): ¥700-1000
Seasonal Flower Soft Serve Ice Cream: ¥400-600
BBQ Set (Reservations often required): ¥3000-5000 per person
data.travelTips: Check the flower blooming schedule before you go, as different flowers are in season throughout the year. Take the ferry from Meinohama Port. The park offers stunning sea views along with the flower fields. Consider renting a bicycle to explore more of the island if time permits. Pack a light jacket as it can be breezy by the sea.
data.essentialItems: Camera, comfortable walking shoes, ferry tickets, sunscreen, hat, light jacket.

data.summary_en: Yanagibashi Rengo Market, often called "Fukuoka's Kitchen," is a bustling traditional market offering an authentic local experience. Despite its compact size, it's packed with stalls selling incredibly fresh seafood, local produce, and various Japanese delicacies. The lively atmosphere, friendly vendors, and the opportunity to taste fresh sashimi right at the source make it a true hidden gem for food enthusiasts and those looking to immerse themselves in local culture. Service is direct and efficient, typical of a busy market.
data.summary_ko: '후쿠오카의 부엌'이라 불리는 야나기바시 렌고 시장은 활기찬 전통 시장으로, 진정한 현지 경험을 선사합니다. 비록 규모는 아담하지만, 믿을 수 없을 정도로 신선한 해산물, 현지 농산물 및 다양한 일본 특산품을 판매하는 상점들로 가득합니다. 생기 넘치는 분위기, 친절한 상인들, 그리고 현장에서 맛보는 신선한 사시미의 기회는 미식가들과 현지 문화를 체험하고자 하는 사람들에게 진정한 숨겨진 보석 같은 곳입니다. 서비스는 바쁜 시장의 특성상 직접적이고 효율적입니다.
data.location: 1 Chome-5 Haruyoshi, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka, 810-0003, Japan
data.menuInfo: Fresh Sashimi (¥800-¥2000 per plate), Grilled Seafood Skewers (¥300-¥800), Tempura (¥500-¥1000), Local Vegetables & Fruits (prices vary), Fish Paste Products (¥200-¥500).
data.travelTips: Visit in the morning when the market is most active and vibrant with fresh catches. Be prepared to navigate crowded narrow aisles. Many stalls offer samples, and some even have small dining areas where you can enjoy incredibly fresh seafood on the spot. Bring cash as some smaller vendors may not accept cards.
data.essentialItems: Cash (yen), camera, an empty stomach, reusable shopping bag.

data.summary_en: The Hakata Machiya Folk Museum offers a fascinating glimpse into the traditional lifestyle and culture of Hakata during the Meiji and Taisho periods. Housed in a beautifully preserved Machiya (traditional merchant house), it showcases historical artifacts, traditional crafts like Hakata-ori weaving, and offers live demonstrations. The atmosphere is authentically preserved, allowing visitors to truly step back in time and appreciate the heritage of Fukuoka.
data.summary_ko: 하카타 마치야 민속박물관은 메이지 및 다이쇼 시대 하카타의 전통적인 생활 방식과 문화를 엿볼 수 있는 매력적인 곳입니다. 아름답게 보존된 마치야(전통 상인 가옥)에 자리하고 있으며, 역사적인 유물과 하카타오리 직물 같은 전통 공예품을 전시하고 라이브 시연도 제공합니다. 과거로 돌아간 듯한 분위기 속에서 후쿠오카의 유산을 깊이 있게 이해할 수 있습니다.
data.menuInfo: N/A
data.travelTips: Explore the traditional Machiya house and observe local craft demonstrations. Located near Kushida Shrine, making it easy to combine visits.
data.essentialItems: Camera, yen for admission and small souvenirs.

data.summary_en: Sumiyoshi Shrine is a serene and historically significant Shinto shrine, boasting beautiful traditional architecture amidst a tranquil, tree-filled park. As one of Japan's oldest Sumiyoshi shrines, it offers a peaceful escape and a deep sense of spiritual heritage. Visitors can admire the main hall, explore the quiet grounds, and experience a moment of calm reflection away from the city's hustle. It's a perfect place to appreciate Japanese culture and ancient traditions.
data.summary_ko: 스미요시 신사는 평화롭고 역사적으로 중요한 신사로, 고요한 나무가 우거진 공원 속에 아름다운 전통 건축물을 자랑합니다. 일본에서 가장 오래된 스미요시 신사 중 하나로서, 도시의 번잡함에서 벗어나 평화로운 휴식과 깊은 영적 유산을 느낄 수 있습니다. 본당을 감상하고 고요한 경내를 둘러보며 잠시 명상의 시간을 가질 수 있습니다. 일본 문화와 고대 전통을 이해하기에 완벽한 장소입니다.
data.menuInfo: N/A
data.travelTips: Observe the traditional Japanese architecture. Look for the ancient sumo wrestler statue. Visit during a festival if possible for a more vibrant experience.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable shoes, respectful attire.

data.summary_en: Marine World Uminonakamichi is a captivating aquarium offering a fantastic experience for all ages. The diverse marine life displays are engaging, and the highlight is undoubtedly the dynamic dolphin and sea lion shows, performed in a stadium pool with a scenic backdrop. The facilities are clean and well-maintained, creating an enjoyable atmosphere. While the food options at Reilly Restaurant are standard for an attraction, the overall educational and entertainment value makes it a worthwhile visit for families and ocean enthusiasts.
data.summary_ko: 마린월드 우미노나카미치는 모든 연령대가 즐길 수 있는 매혹적인 아쿠아리움입니다. 다양하고 흥미로운 해양 생물 전시와 함께, 아름다운 배경을 자랑하는 스타디움 풀에서 펼쳐지는 역동적인 돌고래 및 바다사자 쇼가 단연 하이라이트입니다. 시설은 깨끗하고 잘 관리되어 쾌적한 분위기를 제공합니다. 레일리 레스토랑의 식사 메뉴는 일반적인 관광지 수준이지만, 교육적이고 엔터테인먼트적인 가치가 높아 가족과 해양 생물을 좋아하는 분들에게 방문할 가치가 충분합니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday-Sunday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM (Hours may vary seasonally, check official website)
data.menuInfo: Reilly Restaurant offers various dishes. (e.g., Kids Plate (¥900), Curry Rice (¥1200), Pasta (¥1300), Soft Drinks (¥400))
data.travelTips: Arrive early to catch the popular dolphin and sea lion shows. Allocate enough time to explore the diverse exhibits and consider visiting Uminonakamichi Seaside Park next door for a full day out.
data.essentialItems: Camera, comfortable walking shoes, umbrella/sunscreen depending on weather.

data.summary_en: The Fukuoka Castle Ruins offer a fascinating journey back in time, set within the beautiful Maizuru Park. While only remnants of the original castle remain, the impressive stone walls and reconstructed gates provide a strong sense of history. The atmosphere is peaceful and offers lovely views, especially from the top of the former castle keep. It's a great place for a leisurely walk, enjoying both historical significance and natural beauty. The park's open nature means service is self-guided, focusing on exploration.
data.summary_ko: 후쿠오카 성터는 아름다운 마이즈루 공원 안에 자리하여 후쿠오카의 역사 속으로 흥미로운 여행을 제공합니다. 원래 성의 잔해만 남아있지만, 인상적인 돌담과 재건된 문들은 강한 역사의 숨결을 느끼게 합니다. 평화로운 분위기 속에서 특히 옛 성터의 정상에서는 아름다운 경치를 감상할 수 있습니다. 역사적 의미와 자연의 아름다움을 동시에 즐기며 여유롭게 산책하기 좋은 곳입니다. 공원의 개방적인 특성상 서비스는 셀프 가이드 방식으로, 탐험에 중점을 둡니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday-Sunday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM (Maizuru Park, where the ruins are located, is open 24 hours)
data.ticketInfo: Free (Special exhibitions or certain areas might have an entrance fee)
data.menuInfo: N/A (As a historical park, there are no permanent signature menu items. Vending machines and occasional food stalls may be present within Maizuru Park.)
data.travelTips: Explore the remaining stone walls and turrets for a glimpse into Fukuoka's past. Visit during spring for stunning cherry blossoms, as the ruins are located within Maizuru Park, a popular sakura viewing spot.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable walking shoes, camera, a light snack and water.

data.summary_en: Nakasu Food Stalls Street, or "Yatai," offers a quintessential Fukuoka experience, bustling with energy and tantalizing aromas along the Naka River. While it can be crowded and touristy, sampling Hakata ramen, yakitori, or oden from one of the many charming stalls is a must-do. The intimate setting provides a unique opportunity to interact with locals and fellow travelers, making it a memorable culinary and cultural adventure despite the occasional language barrier.
data.summary_ko: 나카스 포장마차 거리는 나카 강변을 따라 활기찬 에너지와 맛있는 향기로 가득 찬 후쿠오카의 대표적인 경험을 선사합니다. 북적이고 관광객이 많을 수 있지만, 하카타 라멘, 야키토리, 오뎅 등을 맛보는 것은 필수입니다. 아늑한 분위기에서 현지인 및 다른 여행객들과 교류하며 독특한 미식과 문화적 모험을 즐길 수 있습니다.
data.location: 1-chōme-8 Nakasu, Hakata Ward, Fukuoka, 810-0801 일본 (Along the Naka River)
data.operatingHours: 6:00 PM - 12:00 AM (Daily, individual stall hours may vary)
data.menuInfo: Hakata Ramen (¥800-¥1200), Yakitori (skewers, ¥150-¥300 per skewer), Oden (stew, ¥100-¥500 per item), Tempura (¥500-¥1000 per plate), Gyoza (¥400-¥700) (These are typical menu items, prices vary by stall)
data.travelTips: Arrive early to get a seat as stalls fill up quickly. Be prepared for a lively, cozy atmosphere and possibly limited English communication. Cash is preferred, and some stalls might have a cover charge or minimum order.
data.essentialItems: Cash, adventurous palate, comfortable walking shoes.

data.summary_en: Tsukishima Monja Tamatoya Tenjin offers a lively and interactive dining experience with its delicious monja. The atmosphere is casual yet energetic, perfect for friends and families to gather around the hot plates. The taste is a unique blend of savory and umami, with fresh ingredients that truly shine. Service is friendly and helpful, especially for first-timers learning to cook monja. It's a must-visit for a fun and authentic local culinary adventure.
data.summary_ko: 츠키시마 몬자 타마토야 텐진은 맛있는 몬자를 직접 만들며 즐길 수 있는 활기찬 식당입니다. 캐주얼하면서도 에너지가 넘치는 분위기는 친구나 가족과 함께 뜨거운 철판에 둘러앉아 즐기기에 완벽합니다. 신선한 재료에서 우러나오는 감칠맛과 고소함이 일품이며, 특히 몬자를 처음 접하는 사람들에게도 친절하게 도와주는 서비스가 인상 깊습니다. 후쿠오카에서 색다른 현지 요리 경험을 하고 싶다면 꼭 방문해야 할 곳입니다.
data.menuInfo: Mentaiko Mochi Cheese Monja (¥1800), Pork Kimchi Monja (¥1600), Seafood Monja (¥2200), Okonomiyaki (¥1500), Yakitori (¥300-¥500 per skewer)
data.travelTips: Try making monja yourself at the table for a fun, interactive experience. Reservations are recommended during peak hours, especially for groups.
data.essentialItems: Comfortable clothes (the cooking process can be a bit smoky), an appetite for savory pancakes, and a camera to capture the fun.

data.summary_en: U.S. Burger offers a delightful taste of American-style burgers right in Fukuoka. The cozy, easygoing atmosphere makes it a perfect spot for a relaxed meal. Each burger is crafted with juicy patties, fresh vegetables, and delicious sauces, providing a truly satisfying experience. The service is prompt and friendly, contributing to a welcoming vibe. It's a fantastic choice for anyone craving a high-quality, flavorful burger that stands out from the crowd.
data.summary_ko: U.S. 버거는 후쿠오카에서 즐기는 맛있는 미국식 햄버거 전문점입니다. 아늑하고 편안한 분위기가 매력적이며, 여유로운 식사를 즐기기에 완벽한 장소입니다. 육즙 가득한 패티와 신선한 채소, 특별한 소스가 어우러진 버거는 진정으로 만족스러운 경험을 선사합니다. 신속하고 친절한 서비스 또한 환영받는 분위기를 더합니다. 고품질의 풍미 가득한 햄버거를 찾는 분들에게 강력히 추천하는 곳입니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday: 11:30 AM - 2:00 PM, 5:00 PM - 10:00 PM; Saturday, Sunday: 11:30 AM - 10:00 PM; Closed on Wednesday.
data.menuInfo: Classic Cheeseburger (¥1300), Bacon Egg Burger (¥1600), Avocado Burger (¥1500), French Fries (¥400), Milkshake (¥600)
data.travelTips: Arrive early for lunch or dinner to avoid queues as it's a popular spot. This location is pet-friendly, which is a rare and welcome bonus.
data.essentialItems: Cash or NFC payment (credit/debit cards are not accepted).

data.summary_en: Restaurant Sola offers an exquisite French dining experience with stunning bay views from Bayside Place Hakata. The ambiance is elegant and sophisticated, making it ideal for special occasions. Each dish is a masterpiece of culinary art, meticulously prepared with fresh, seasonal ingredients and presented beautifully. The flavors are delicate yet profound, perfectly balanced to tantalize the palate. The service is impeccable, attentive, and discreet, ensuring a memorable and luxurious meal.
data.summary_ko: 레스토랑 솔라는 하카타 베이사이드 플레이스에서 멋진 바다 전망과 함께 절묘한 프랑스 미식 경험을 제공합니다. 우아하고 세련된 분위기는 특별한 날을 위한 완벽한 장소입니다. 모든 요리는 신선한 제철 재료로 세심하게 준비되고 아름답게 담겨 나오는 요리 예술의 걸작입니다. 섬세하면서도 깊이 있는 맛은 완벽하게 균형을 이루어 미각을 즐겁게 합니다. 흠잡을 데 없는 세심하고 품격 있는 서비스는 기억에 남을 만한 고급스러운 식사를 보장합니다.
data.location: 13−６ Bayside Place Hakata C-kan 2F, Chikkōhonmachi, Hakata Ward, Fukuoka, 812-0021 Japan
data.operatingHours: Monday-Friday: 6:00 PM - 10:00 PM; Saturday: 12:00 PM - 3:00 PM, 6:00 PM - 10:00 PM; Closed on Sunday.
data.menuInfo: Chef's Tasting Menu (Lunch: ¥8000-¥12000, Dinner: ¥15000-¥25000), Wine Pairing (¥8000-¥15000), Amuse-Bouche, Seasonal Fish Course, Dessert Platter (all included in course)
data.travelTips: Reservations are highly recommended, often required well in advance. A smart casual to formal dress code is generally expected. Enjoy the beautiful Bayside views during your meal.
data.essentialItems: A reservation and appropriate attire.

data.summary_en: Miyachiku Steak offers an exceptional dining experience specializing in premium Miyazaki beef. The restaurant provides an elegant setting, often with a teppanyaki counter where chefs skillfully prepare your meal right before your eyes. The quality of the steak is superb, perfectly cooked to highlight its rich marbling and tender texture. Service is professional and attentive, ensuring a refined and enjoyable meal. It’s an ideal choice for those seeking a luxurious and unforgettable wagyu steak dinner.
data.summary_ko: 미야치쿠 스테이크는 프리미엄 미야자키 소고기를 전문으로 하는 특별한 식사 경험을 제공합니다. 우아한 분위기에서 셰프가 눈앞에서 능숙하게 요리를 준비하는 철판구이 카운터를 자주 볼 수 있습니다. 스테이크의 품질은 매우 뛰어나며, 풍부한 마블링과 부드러운 식감을 완벽하게 살려 조리됩니다. 서비스는 전문적이고 세심하여 세련되고 즐거운 식사를 보장합니다. 잊을 수 없는 고급 와규 스테이크 저녁 식사를 찾는 분들에게 이상적인 선택입니다.
data.location: 5-chōme-2-1 J-Park Nakasu Bldg 2F, Nakasu, Hakata Ward, Fukuoka, 810-0801 Japan
data.menuInfo: Miyazaki Beef Sirloin Course (150g, ¥10000-¥15000), Miyazaki Beef Fillet Course (120g, ¥12000-¥18000), Grilled Vegetables, Garlic Rice, Dessert and Coffee (all included in course)
data.travelTips: For a premium steak experience, consider booking in advance, especially for dinner. If available, enjoy the entertaining teppanyaki show by the skilled chefs.
data.essentialItems: A reservation, and an appetite for high-quality Miyazaki beef.

data.summary_en: Sushi Sakai offers an exceptional omakase experience, showcasing the pinnacle of traditional Japanese sushi artistry. The intimate setting allows for a personal connection with the master chef, who meticulously crafts each piece with precision and passion. The fish is incredibly fresh, sourced daily, and melts in your mouth, perfectly complemented by expertly seasoned rice. The service is discreet and refined, ensuring a tranquil and profoundly satisfying culinary journey. This is a must-visit for discerning sushi lovers.
data.summary_ko: 스시 사카이는 전통 일본 스시 예술의 정수를 보여주는 잊을 수 없는 오마카세 경험을 선사합니다. 친밀한 분위기 속에서 장인 정신을 가진 셰프가 정교하고 열정적으로 각 스시를 만듭니다. 매일 공수되는 생선은 놀랍도록 신선하며 입안에서 녹아내리고, 완벽하게 간 된 밥과 조화를 이룹니다. 품격 있고 세심한 서비스는 고요하고 깊이 만족스러운 미식 여정을 보장합니다. 진정한 스시 애호가라면 꼭 방문해야 할 곳입니다.
data.location: 3−２０ LANE Round Bldg 2F, Nishinakasu, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka, 810-0002 Japan
data.operatingHours: Tuesday: 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM, 8:30 PM - 10:30 PM; Wednesday, Friday: 11:00 AM - 1:00 PM, 1:30 PM - 3:30 PM, 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM, 8:30 PM - 10:30 PM; Thursday: 11:00 AM - 1:00 PM, 1:30 PM - 3:30 PM; Saturday: 11:00 AM - 1:00 PM, 1:30 PM - 3:30 PM, 5:00 PM - 7:00 PM, 7:30 PM - 9:30 PM; Closed on Monday, Sunday.
data.menuInfo: Omakase Lunch Course (¥10000-¥18000), Omakase Dinner Course (¥20000-¥35000), Sake Pairing (¥7000-¥12000), Seasonal Nigiri, Grilled Dish (all included in course)
data.travelTips: Reservations are essential and often need to be made well in advance due to limited seating and high demand. Be prepared for an intimate and traditional sushi experience where you can observe the chef's artistry.
data.essentialItems: A confirmed reservation, respectful demeanor, and an appreciation for expertly crafted sushi.

data.summary_en: Uoden in Fukuoka offers an exquisite seafood experience in a chic, relaxed setting. The sashimi is incredibly fresh, melting in your mouth, and the grilled dishes are perfectly seasoned, highlighting the natural flavors of the ocean. Service is attentive and efficient, ensuring a pleasant dining experience. The ambiance strikes a balance between traditional Japanese elegance and modern comfort, making it ideal for both casual lunches and special dinners. A must-visit for seafood lovers in Fukuoka.
data.summary_ko: 후쿠오카의 우오덴은 세련되고 편안한 분위기에서 훌륭한 해산물 요리를 제공합니다. 사시미는 놀랍도록 신선하여 입안에서 살살 녹으며, 구이 요리들은 해산물의 본연의 맛을 살려 완벽하게 간이 되어 있습니다. 직원들은 친절하고 세심한 서비스를 제공하여 즐거운 식사를 보장합니다. 전통적인 일본의 우아함과 현대적인 편안함이 조화를 이루는 분위기는 캐주얼한 점심 식사부터 특별한 저녁 식사까지 모든 상황에 적합합니다. 후쿠오카에서 해산물을 좋아하는 분들에게 꼭 추천하는 곳입니다.
data.menuInfo: Sashimi Assortment (¥2500-¥5000), Grilled Fish (seasonal, ¥1500-¥2500), Tempura Platter (¥1800)
data.travelTips: Reservations recommended, especially for dinner. Try the chef's special omakase for a true taste of fresh local seafood.
data.essentialItems: Cash or credit card.

data.summary_en: Torimabushi offers a delightful culinary journey with its signature chicken hitsumabushi. The grilled chicken, perfectly caramelized and tender, is a revelation. The multi-layered eating experience, from savoring it plain to adding various condiments and finally transforming it into a soothing ochazuke with dashi, is truly engaging. The restaurant has a warm, inviting atmosphere, making it a comfortable spot for a unique local meal. Service is friendly and they are happy to guide you through the eating ritual.
data.summary_ko: 토리마부시는 시그니처 닭고기 히츠마부시로 즐거운 미식 경험을 선사합니다. 완벽하게 캐러멜화되고 부드러운 구운 닭고기는 정말 놀랍습니다. 그냥 먹기, 다양한 양념을 추가하기, 그리고 마지막으로 다시 육수를 부어 오차즈케로 즐기는 다층적인 식사 경험은 진정으로 매력적입니다. 따뜻하고 아늑한 분위기는 독특한 현지 식사를 즐기기에 편안한 장소입니다. 친절한 서비스와 함께 식사 방법을 친절하게 안내해줍니다.
data.location: 1F-2 Belle Cortile, 2-16-42 Sumiyoshi, Hakata Ward, Fukuoka, 812-0018, Japan
data.menuInfo: Torimabushi Set (¥2,000-¥3,000), Chicken Tsukune (¥600), Chicken Karaage (¥800)
data.travelTips: Torimabushi is a Fukuoka specialty, similar to Hitsumabushi but with chicken. Enjoy it in three ways: as is, with condiments, and as ochazuke (with dashi broth).
data.essentialItems: An empty stomach to fully appreciate the various ways to eat Torimabushi.

data.summary_en: Sushi Kakujuan offers an unparalleled sushi experience, truly a hidden gem for connoisseurs. Each piece of nigiri is a work of art, prepared with meticulous attention to detail using only the freshest, seasonal seafood. The subtle flavors of the fish are perfectly complemented by the expertly seasoned rice. The intimate atmosphere and the chef's masterful technique create an unforgettable dining journey. It's an ideal choice for a special occasion or for anyone seeking the pinnacle of sushi craftsmanship in Fukuoka.
data.summary_ko: 스시 카쿠쥬안은 진정한 미식가들을 위한 비할 데 없는 스시 경험을 제공하는 숨겨진 보석 같은 곳입니다. 각 니기리 한 점은 신선한 제철 해산물만을 사용하여 세심한 주의를 기울여 만든 예술 작품입니다. 생선의 섬세한 맛은 훌륭하게 간이 된 밥과 완벽하게 어우러집니다. 친밀한 분위기와 셰프의 장인 정신은 잊을 수 없는 식사 경험을 선사합니다. 특별한 날이나 후쿠오카에서 최고의 스시를 찾는 사람들에게 이상적인 선택입니다.
data.menuInfo: Omakase Sushi Course (¥10,000-¥20,000+), Nigiri Assortment (seasonal, ¥5000-¥10,000), Sashimi Platter (¥4000-¥8000)
data.travelTips: This is a high-end sushi restaurant, so expect excellent quality and a refined experience. Reservations are highly recommended, especially for the omakase course. Dress code is smart casual.
data.essentialItems: Reservation, suitable attire, and an appreciation for authentic Japanese sushi.

data.summary_en: Tontonton is a bustling and authentic yakiton izakaya that truly captures the essence of Fukuoka's local dining scene. The skewers are grilled to perfection, boasting a delicious smoky char and tender, juicy meat. From classic pork belly to more adventurous cuts, each skewer is a flavor packed delight. The lively atmosphere, coupled with excellent service, makes for a memorable evening. It’s a fantastic spot to enjoy local beverages and experience true Japanese izakaya culture with friends.
data.summary_ko: 돈돈톤은 후쿠오카 현지 식사 분위기의 진수를 담아낸 활기차고 정통 야키톤 이자카야입니다. 꼬치는 완벽하게 구워져 맛있는 불향과 부드럽고 육즙 가득한 고기를 자랑합니다. 클래식한 삼겹살부터 좀 더 색다른 부위까지, 각 꼬치 하나하나가 풍미 가득한 즐거움입니다. 활기찬 분위기와 훌륭한 서비스가 어우러져 기억에 남는 저녁을 선사합니다. 친구들과 함께 현지 음료를 즐기며 진정한 일본 이자카야 문화를 경험하기에 환상적인 장소입니다.
data.menuInfo: Assorted Yakiton Skewers (¥1,500-¥2,500), Pork Belly Skewers (¥300/skewer), Pork Tongue Skewers (¥250/skewer)
data.travelTips: Tontonton specializes in yakiton (pork skewers). Order a variety to sample different cuts and preparations. It's a great place for an evening meal with drinks.
data.essentialItems: An adventurous palate for various pork cuts, and a willingness to try local sake or beer.

data.summary_en: Maruni provides a delightful Japanese dining experience with a focus on fresh ingredients and expertly prepared dishes. The atmosphere is lively and welcoming, making it suitable for both quick bites and relaxed meals. Their tonkatsu is particularly praised for its crispy exterior and juicy, tender pork. The service is efficient and friendly, characteristic of many popular Japanese eateries, ensuring a satisfying and enjoyable meal.
data.summary_ko: 마루니는 신선한 재료와 숙련된 조리법으로 맛있는 일본 요리를 제공합니다. 활기차고 친근한 분위기는 빠르고 맛있는 식사 또는 여유로운 식사 모두에 적합합니다. 특히 돈까스는 바삭한 겉과 촉촉하고 부드러운 속으로 인기가 많습니다. 친절하고 효율적인 서비스로 만족스러운 식사를 즐길 수 있습니다.
data.location: Solaria Stage B2F, 2-chōme−11−３ Tenjin, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka, 810-0001 Japan
data.menuInfo:
- Tonkatsu Set Meal (¥1,500 - ¥2,500)
- Katsu Curry (¥1,200)
- Ebi Fry Set (¥1,800)
- Assorted Skewers (¥800 - ¥1,500)
data.travelTips: Located conveniently in Solaria Stage, it's a great spot for a casual yet delicious meal. Expect a queue during peak lunch and dinner hours. Try their signature katsu.
data.essentialItems: Cash or credit card, appetite for fried delights.

data.summary_en: Hakata Motsunabe Ooyama at Kitte Hakata offers an authentic and incredibly satisfying motsunabe experience. The rich broth, whether soy sauce or miso, perfectly complements the tender, flavorful offal. The atmosphere is lively yet comfortable, suitable for both families and groups. Service is efficient and friendly, ensuring a delightful meal from start to finish. A must-try for a true taste of Fukuoka.
data.summary_ko: 하카타 모츠나베 오오야마 킷테 하카타점은 후쿠오카의 대표적인 모츠나베를 맛볼 수 있는 곳입니다. 진하고 깊은 육수와 부드러운 곱창의 조화가 일품이며, 특히 미소 맛 모츠나베는 꼭 경험해봐야 할 메뉴입니다. 활기찬 분위기에서 친절하고 빠른 서비스를 받을 수 있어 매우 만족스러웠습니다. 후쿠오카 방문 시 놓치지 말아야 할 맛집입니다.
data.location: 9−１ KITTE Hakata 9F, Hakataekichūōgai, Hakata Ward, Fukuoka, 812-0012, Japan
data.menuInfo: Motsunabe (Soy Sauce or Miso flavor) (from ¥1500), Additional Motsunabe Ingredients (Vegetables, Tofu) (from ¥500), Champon Noodles (¥300), Zosui (Rice Porridge) (¥350)
data.travelTips: Reservations are highly recommended, especially for dinner, to secure a table at this popular spot. If dining with a group, consider trying both the soy sauce and miso broths for a varied experience. Don't forget to add champon noodles or rice at the end to soak up the delicious broth.
data.essentialItems: Cash or credit card.

data.summary_en: Shin-Shin Ramen Tenjin Main Store offers a fantastic Hakata-style tonkotsu ramen with a lighter, yet deeply flavorful pork broth. The thin noodles are cooked to perfection, and the tender char siu simply melts in your mouth. The bustling, authentic ramen shop atmosphere adds to the experience. Service is quick and efficient, making it a great spot for a satisfying meal. A must-visit for ramen lovers in Fukuoka.
data.summary_ko: 신신라멘 텐진본점은 가볍지만 깊은 맛의 돈코츠 라멘으로 유명합니다. 얇은 면발과 부드러운 차슈가 완벽한 조화를 이루며, 활기찬 라멘집 분위기에서 식사하는 즐거움이 있습니다. 회전율이 빨라 대기 시간이 길지 않고, 친절하고 신속한 서비스로 만족스러운 식사를 할 수 있습니다. 후쿠오카 라멘 투어에서 빼놓을 수 없는 맛집입니다.
data.operatingHours: Monday, Tuesday, Thursday-Sunday: 11:00 AM - 3:00 AM; Wednesday: Closed
data.menuInfo: Hakata Tonkotsu Ramen (¥800-¥1000), Char Siu Ramen (¥1200), Gyoza (¥400), Kaedama (extra noodles) (¥150)
data.travelTips: Expect a queue, especially during peak lunch and dinner hours. Order extra noodles, known as "kaedama," if you want to enjoy more of the rich broth. This spot is known for its lighter, yet intensely flavorful tonkotsu broth, a unique take on Hakata ramen.
data.essentialItems: Cash (some branches accept card/NFC, but cash is common in ramen shops).

data.summary_en: Yakitori Hareluya offers an exceptional yakitori experience with its perfectly grilled skewers and lively atmosphere. Each skewer, from classic chicken thigh to creative vegetable options, is seasoned and cooked to perfection, boasting incredible flavor and tenderness. Despite its high quality, the prices are surprisingly affordable, making it a local favorite. The friendly staff and cozy ambiance make for a memorable evening.
data.summary_ko: 야키토리 하레루야는 완벽하게 구워진 꼬치 요리와 활기찬 분위기가 일품인 곳입니다. 닭 다리살부터 다양한 채소 꼬치까지, 모든 꼬치는 훌륭한 맛과 부드러움을 자랑하며, 가격 또한 합리적이어서 현지인들에게 큰 사랑을 받고 있습니다. 친절한 직원과 아늑한 분위기에서 후쿠오카의 밤을 만끽하기에 최적의 장소입니다.
data.menuInfo: Assorted Yakitori Platter (¥1500-¥2500), Chicken Thigh Skewer (¥200), Pork Belly Skewer (¥250), Tsukune (Minced Chicken Skewer) (¥220), Vegetable Skewers (¥180-¥250)
data.travelTips: Going with a group allows you to sample a wider variety of skewers. Be sure to pair your yakitori with local sake or a refreshing draft beer for the ultimate izakaya experience. It can get busy, so consider making a reservation or arriving early.
data.essentialItems: An adventurous palate for different cuts of meat and vegetables on skewers.

data.summary_en: Ganso Hakata Mentaiju offers a unique and indulgent culinary experience centered around mentaiko. The signature dish, Mentaiju, features perfectly cooked rice topped with a generous portion of seasoned mentaiko, offering a delightful balance of savory and spicy flavors. The elegant atmosphere and refined presentation elevate the meal, making it a must-try for anyone visiting Fukuoka. It's a true taste of local gourmet.
data.summary_ko: 원조 하카타 멘타이쥬는 명란을 중심으로 한 독특하고 풍성한 미식 경험을 제공합니다. 시그니처 메뉴인 멘타이쥬는 잘 지어진 밥 위에 풍성한 명란이 올라가 짭조름하면서도 매콤한 맛의 조화가 훌륭합니다. 세련된 분위기와 정갈한 음식 플레이팅이 식사를 더욱 특별하게 만들어주며, 후쿠오카를 방문하는 모든 이들에게 강력 추천하는 현지 미식입니다.
